function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for disease transmission through proximity contact","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Enabling effective contact tracing and notification systems","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, location-specific alerts, database scanning","People":"Users in proximity, general public","Owner":"Ministry of Health, government-owned databases"},{"Description":"Spread of misinformation and infodemic through social media","Impact":"Widespread dissemination of false information leading to panic and improper disease management","Mitigation":"Development of applications combating misinformation, fact-checking systems","Technologies":"Chatbots, applications for combating misinformation","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Technicians, World Health Organisation (WHO)"},{"Description":"Lack of traceability and fact-checking in encrypted messaging platforms","Impact":"Unregulated spread of unverified claims and information","Mitigation":"Partnerships with encrypted messaging platforms, development of fact-checking systems","Technologies":"Encryption partnerships, chatbots, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Users of encrypted messaging platforms, general public","Owner":"World Health Organisation (WHO), media organizations"}]}
